confirm_fcm_reset.title: Clear Notification Device Registry?
confirm_fcm_reset.body:
You are about to reset the device registry, which is used to determine the devices to which the companion sends notifications.
To re-establish push notifications, you will need to restart the app on all devices and connect them to the machine once again. 

Confirm your action.

body.oe: Please confirm the unlinking of the printer {} from OctoEverywhere.
body.other: Please confirm the removal of the remote connection from printer {}.

body.oe: This printer is already linked with OctoEverywhere for remote access. Please unlink it before proceeding.
body.obico: This printer is already lined Obico for remote access. Please unlink it before continuing.
body.other: A remote connection is already established for this printer. Please remove it before proceeding.

remote_interface_removed.title: Remote connection removed!

remote_interface_added.body: Make sure to save the printer to apply the changes.

wifi_access_warning.title: WiFi Information Unavailable
wifi_access_warning.subtitle:
To determine if Mobileraker should use the remote connection, grant location access. This allows the app to fetch the name of the current WiFi Network.

Tap to grant the permission.

local_ssid.helper: Smart switching makes the app automatically switch between the local and remote connection based on the current WiFi network. To enable this feature, add your home's WiFi name to the list.

dialog.label: WiFi Name (SSID)
dialog.quick_add_hint: Hint: To quickly add the current WiFi name, long-press the button that opened this dialog.

error_fetching_snackbar.title: Error while fetching WiFi name!
error_fetching_snackbar.body: Please make sure the app has the necessary permissions to access the device's WiFi state.

temp_ordering.title: Temperature Sensor UI-Ordering
temp_ordering.helper: Change the order of the temperature sensors on the dashboard.

fan_ordering.title: Fan UI-Ordering
fan_ordering.helper: Change the order of the fans on the dashboard.

misc_ordering.title: Misc Element UI-Ordering
misc_ordering.helper: Change the order of the miscellaneous elements on the dashboard.

select_mode.title: Pick an input mode:
select_mode.body: If you are new to this, it's best to stick to the simple mode. However, if you are experienced and need to use custom headers, certificates, etc., then the expert mode is for you. Keep in mind that the mode you choose won't affect the app itself, but it will determine how the input is validated and displayed, and what options are available while you are adding a machine.

simple_form.hint_body: Simple mode allows you to enter the host and port. However, if you need to customize the path, headers, certificates, or other settings, switch to the advanced mode.

advanced_form.hint_body: Please note that in Advanced mode, validation is mostly disabled. It is important that you take full responsibility for ensuring that the URL you enter is valid.
advanced_form.http_helper: Please enter the HTTP endpoint of Moonraker

test_connection.proceed_warning: It seems like the app is having trouble connecting to the machine. This might be because you are not on the same network as the machine or you do not have the necessary permissions to access it. Although you can choose to add the machine despite the issue, please be aware that there is no guarantee that it will connect properly. Please proceed with caution.

provider_error.title: Error fetching Console Data
provider_error.body: An error occurred while trying to fetch the console data. Please retry later!

markdown.error: An error occurred while trying to fetch {};

manage_view.title: Thanks for your Support!
manage_view.sub_warning: Please take note that purchasing the lifetime supporter tier does not automatically cancel any other active subscription. You will need to cancel any active subscriptions manually. However, you have the option to continue supporting the development of Mobileraker on a recurring basis even after purchasing the lifetime supporter tier.

subscribe_view.title: Become a Mobileraker Supporter!
subscribe_view.info:
Mobileraker aims to provide a fast and reliable mobile UI for Klipper, driven by the spirit of RepRap, that open-source software and hardware can make a positive impact.
As Mobileraker is developed by a single developer and offered for free, it relies on community funding to cover both operational and development costs.
subscribe_view.subscription_info: If you opt into a subscription, you can cancel it at any time. The subscription will be automatically renewed unless you cancel it before the end of the current period. To cancel, go to the {} and cancel the subscription from there.

supporter_tier_list.error_body: Sorry, an unexpected error occurred. Could not load the SupporterTiers. Please retry later!

paywall.title: Support the Dev!
paywall.trial_disclaimer: You won't be charged until the end of the free trial, and you can cancel anytime during it.

beltTuner.title: Belt Tuner
beltTuner.description: Ensuring proper belt tension is essential for optimal performance in 3D printers. Incorrect tension, whether too tight or too loose, may lead to mechanical problems, premature wear, and compromised print quality. The tension values provided serve as reference points; however, it is advisable to consult the manufacturer's recommendations for specific guidelines tailored to your printer model. Adjustments should be made based on both these recommendations and individual printer requirements and conditions.

permissionWarning.title: Microphone permission required
permissionWarning.subtitle:
The belt tuner uses your phone's microphone to analyze the frequency of your belts.

Tap to grant the permission.

spoolman.title: Spoolman

Please make sure that Spoolman is installed and enabled on your printer.
spoolman.learn_more: To learn more about Spoolman and how to install it, visit the project's

supporter_perks.title: Supporter Perks
supporter_perks.body: By supporting Mobileraker, you ensure the app can stay free for the community. Additionally supporters gain the following list of perks.
supporter_perks.hint: Hint: As of now, perks are device based. This might change in the future.

webrtc_perk.title: WebRtc Support
webrtc_perk.subtitle: Allows the usage of WebRtc webcams!

job_queue_perk.title: Job Queue
job_queue_perk.subtitle: Manage Moonraker's job queue from within Mobileraker!

unlimited_printers_perk.title: Unlimited Printers
unlimited_printers_perk.subtitle: Control as many printers as you want using Mobileraker!

printer_theme_perk.title: Printer based Themes

full_file_management_perk.title: Full File Management
full_file_management_perk.subtitle: Unlock the full file management capabilities of Mobileraker!

bed_screw_adjust.title: Bed Screw Adjust
bed_screw_adjust.hint: Click Adjusted if a significant adjustment is necessary on the current screw; otherwise, click Accept to continue.

tipping.title: Tip the Developer!
tipping.body: This tip is solely meant to appreciate the developer's efforts and DOES NOT grant access to any additional features.

filament_sensor_triggered.body:
Sensor '{}' has been triggered.

Please check the printer and the sensor to ensure filament is available or disable the sensor.

screws_tilt_adjust.title: Screws Tilt Adjust
screws_tilt_adjust.hint: The dialog helps you adjust the screws of the bed. For each screw you are seeing the required adjustments as clock in HH:MM format. For example, 01:15 indicates a full rotation plus a quarter turn in the direction the icon indicates.

dashboard_page_settings.title: Dashboard Page Settings
dashboard_page_settings.icon_label: Select the icon for the page:

unload.processed: Did the filament come out of the extruder? Repeat if necessary

subtitle.processed: Verify purged material is clean. Repeat if necessary

You are about to cancel the print job.

job_queue_sheet.empty: The job queue is empty. You can add jobs via the file browser.
job_queue_sheet.remove_all_confirm: This operation will remove all jobs from the queue.

add_remote_con.disclosure: {service} is not affiliated with Mobileraker. It may require an additional subscription. Please check {service}'s website for more information.

active_service_info.title: Existing configuration found!
active_service_info.body: You are currently using {} as your remote connection service. Remove it before adding a new one.

octoeverywehre.description: OctoEverywhere.com is a community project allowing you to securely connect to your printer from anywhere. OctoEverywhere also provides the community free AI print failure detection, notifications, live streaming, and more. Setup only takes 20 seconds!

manual.description: If you are an advanced user, you can choose to manually add an alternative connection. The alternative connection comes into play when attempts to connect to the primary address are unsuccessful. This can be useful if you have a reverse proxy connection to your printer, or if you have a secondary IP address that you can use to connect to your printer.
manual.address_hint: The base adress of the remote connection to be used

obico.description: Obico is a community-driven, fully open-source 3D printing software. It enables you to control and monitor your Klipper printer from anywhere, all at no cost. It stands as one of the pioneering solutions for AI-based failure detection, utilizing only your printer's webcam.

self_hosted.title: Self-Hosted
self_hosted.description: By default Mobileraker will use the official Obico instance. However, if you are managing your own instance, you can specify the URL for it here.
self_hosted.url_hint: The base URL of the self-hosted Obico instance

signIn.subtitle: Although creating an account is optional, it is necessary to do so in order to restore purchases made on another device or platform.

hint.reset_password: Provide your email address to receive a password reset link.

profile.title: You are signed in.
profile.description: Welcome back! Your user account is the key to an enhanced experience on any of your mobile devices. Seamlessly share your Supporter status to enjoy privileges effortlessly, wherever you go with your phone, tablet or other devices.

email_verification.description: Please verify your email address to ensure you can always access your account.

delete_account_dialog.title: Delete Account?
delete_account_dialog.body: You are about to delete your account. This action cannot be undone.
